alert.note: Alert for Northwest Yell County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 12:02PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Logan and north central Yell Counties through 1230 PM CDT... At 1201 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Danville, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Danville... Dardanelle... Mt Nebo State Park... Lake Dardanelle State Park... Mosley... Lake Dardanelle... Belleville... Corinth... Ranger... Delaware... Chickalah... Spring Lake Campground... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northwest Yell County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County; Yell Excluding Northwest
